snippet.title: Stardew Valley - Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
In Stardew Valley, you’ll inherit your grandfather’s old farm and move away from the city to start a new life on your own. Over time, you’ll gain new skills and learn to live off the land. You’ll make friends with the locals, learn their stories, and maybe even start a family with one of the 12 bachelors or bachelorettes.

Stardew Valley gives you plenty of freedom to create the homestead of your dreams and it comes to PS4 on 13th December in the US!

http://www.stardewvalley.net

© ConcernedApe 2016
